metadata.title: The Impossible Dream (22 inspirational favorites)
description: Tracklist:1. The Impossible Dream (The Quest)~2. Bridge over Troubled Water~3. Swing Low, Sweet Chariot~4. He Ain't Heavy...He's My Brother~5. May the Good Lord Bless and Keep You~6. Lean on Me~7. Life Is a Song Worth Singing~8. The Rosary~9. No Man Can Stand Alone~10. Ave Maria~11. What the World Needs Now Is Love~12. Memory~13. Good Night, Dear Lord~14. You Light Up My Life~15. Where Can I Go?~16. Smile~17. Somewhere~18. Eli, Eli~19. The Sound of Music~20. Deep River~21. You Are the Sunshine of My Life~22. Danny Boy.
